The Supernova PC quickly reloads its high-explosive anti-tank plasma charges that carry balanced effectiveness against armor and infantry. VS use only.
Unlock passive, always-on Certifications for the Infiltrator.
The M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. All factions can use this weapon.
The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. All factions can use this weapon.
The L-30R Vektor is accurate but slow firing and can pierce all types of armor. All factions can use this weapon.
The P525 Marauder fires 40mm high explosive grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor. TR use only.
The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.
The E540 Halberd fires 85 mm armor-piercing rockets.  All factions can use this weapon.
The Fury launches 40mm grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor.  It is also capable of light damage against heavy armor.  All factions can use this weapon.
The Enforcer ML85 fires magnetically propelled HEAT darts, suited for sustained damage in mid-range combat scenarios. NC use only.
The C85 fires a canister of heavy shrapnel that is effective against infantry and light armor. NC use only.
The Proton II PPA fires large orbs of volatile plasma that explode on impact.  The PPA is effective against infantry and light armor. VS use only.
The Saron HRB fires a fast and accurate armor damaging particle beam. Accuracy destabilizes for a split second after each shot.  VS use only.
The G30 Vulcan fires armor piercing 30mm rounds capable of damaging heavily armored targets. TR use only.

The Supernova FPC is charged with fast-moving armor-piercing plasma that is more effective against armored targets and inflicts less explosive damage. VS use only.
The Supernova VPC is charged with volatile high-explosive plasma that is less effective against armor, and more lethal to enemy personnel. VS use only.
The Titan-150 AP is loaded with fast moving armor piercing rounds that are stronger against armored targets but inflict almost no explosive damage. NC use only.
The Titan-150 HESH is loaded with high-explosive squash head rounds that sacrifice some effectiveness against armor for increased lethality to enemy personnel. NC use only.
The Titan-150 HEAT is loaded with high-explosive anti-tank rounds that reload quickly and have balanced effectiveness against enemy armor and personnel. NC use only.
The P2-120 AP is loaded with fast-moving armor piercing rounds that are stronger against armored targets, but have less explosive yield than other projectiles. TR use only.
The P2-120 HESH is loaded with high-explosive squash head rounds that are less effective against armor, but more lethal to enemy infantry. TR use only.
The P2-120 HEAT carries quick-reloading high-explosive anti-tank rounds that have balanced effectiveness against armor and infantry. TR use only.
The semi-automatic VA39 Spectre sniper rifle is popular among Vanu Sovereignty infiltrators for supporting their squads from a safe distance. VS use only.
The bolt-action XM98's dialed-in power core interface allows for a remarkably versatile plasma sniper rifle. VS use only.
The Ghost VS12's high rate of fire provides considerable lethality at medium range due to its modified heat-shunting discharge coil. VS use only.
The Maelstrom is a high damage, fast firing nose cannon which tears apart enemy fighters at close range. VS use only.
The Light PPA is a slow-firing plasma cannon that inflicts massive damage at close range. VS use only.

name.en: WING MOUNT:  Photon A2A Missile Pods

description.en: After a short lock-on period, Photon A2A missiles can be fired which carry an explosive payload, melting the armor of heavy aircraft, while being less effective against smaller ones. VS use only.
Dual Photon Pods fire a volley of up to 14 unguided, high-explosive photon rockets. VS use only.
The Vortek Rotary is a high damage, close range cannon that shreds enemy fighters with ease. NC use only.
The M30 Mustang Air Hammer fires a barrage of explosive rounds with each shot which are deadly to enemy infantry and lightly armored vehicles. NC use only.

After a short lock-on period, the Tomcat A2AM platform fires missiles which carry an explosive payload, melting the armor of heavy aircraft, while being less effective against smaller ones. NC use only.
Breaker Rocket Pods fire a volley of up to 12 unguided, high-explosive rockets. NC use only.
The M18 Rotary's high firing rate allows it to shred enemy fighters at short range. TR use only.
The M14 Banshee is a high speed gatling gun that fires explosive 14mm rounds, excellent for dealing with enemy infantry and light vehicles. TR use only.

After a short lock-on period, the Tomcat A2AM platform fires missiles which carry an explosive payload, melting the armor of heavy aircraft, while being less effective against smaller ones. TR use only.
Hellfire Rocket Pods fire a volley of up to 16 unguided, high-explosive rockets. TR use only.
The Python AP is loaded with fast-moving armor-piercing rounds that are strong against armored targets, but have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.
The Python HESH carries high-explosive squash head rounds that are less effective against armor, and more lethal against enemy infantry. All factions can use this weapon.
The Skyguard fires 40mm flak rounds that are highly effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

name.en: Primary: Sniper Rifle: NC14 Bolt Driver

description.en: An upgraded version of the successful NC11, the magazine-fed NC14 Bolt Driver is common on the battlefield due to its versatility and high stopping power. NC use only.

The semi-automatic Special Purpose Rifle (SPR) is a marksman rifle built on the highly-configurable Gauss platform. Developed after the start of the Auraxis War, it has remained in use due to its accuracy when making long-distance shots. NC use only.
The medium-range SAS-R's sniper rifle features a rapid bolt action that allows users to make follow up shots on targets before they can reach cover. NC use only.
The 99SV is a reliable semi-automatic sniper rifle, sometimes favored by new infiltrator recruits. The 99SV allows the shooter to hit multiple follow-up shots at long range. TR use only.
The versatile M77-B's balance of stopping power, accuracy, and rate of fire make it an excellent choice for Infiltrators that have been provided with limited information for a mission. TR use only.
Deadly in the hands of a skilled Infiltrator, the bolt action TSAR-42's features a unique bolt rotation system designed to improve the time between shots. TR use only.
The Beamer VS3 is the standard sidearm for the Vanu Sovereignty. Its high rate of fire allows the user to eliminate nearby targets quickly. VS use only.
The Beamer VS3 is the standard sidearm for the Vanu Sovereignty. Its high rate of fire allows the user to eliminate nearby targets quickly. This variant features a unique gold plating.
Designed as an all-purpose sidearm for VS soldiers, the Manticore SX40 is able to perform well in any situation. VS use only.
The versatile standard-issue NC4 Mag-Shot was the first pistol to utilize Gauss technology. NC use only.
The versatile standard-issue NC4 Mag-Shot was the first pistol to utilize Gauss technology. This variant features a unique gold plating.
The LA8 Rebel's remarkable stopping power makes it a popular choice among Conglomerate infiltrators. NC use only.
The reliable TX1 Repeater is the latest iteration of a firearm design stretching back 300 years. Its 3-round burst fire mode provides considerable stopping power at close range. TR use only.
The reliable TX1-FB Repeater is the latest iteration of a firearm design stretching back 300 years. Its three round burst fire mode provides considerable stopping power at close range.
A popular sidearm amongst TR soldiers, the high-capacity TX2 Emperor has been in service for over 200 years. TR use only.

The Orion VS54 is the standard issue LMG for Vanu Heavy Assault soldiers. Its lightweight construction allows for more accurate hip fire and stability when on the move when compared to most weapons in its class. VS use only.

Embedded recoil dampeners along the barrel of the Polaris allow it to remain accurate during sustained fire while aiming. The Polaris also boasts better hipfire accuracy than most LMGs in its class. VS use only.

The Pulsar Light Support Weapon (LSW) is a Pulsar variant with a high capacity battery and heavier barrel. Its reputation as a highly versatile weapon makes it a popular choice for missions where anything can happen. VS use only.
The NC6 Gauss SAW's low production cost, reliability, and sheer stopping power lead to wide-spread adoption of the weapon in the Auraxian War's early years. NC use only.

Esamir Munition Corporation's first forray into the weapons market yielded an LMG that remains accurate while sustaining fire. The EM1 boasts fast reloads and high ammo capacity, allowing it to control firing lanes with ease. NC use only.

Genudine Dynamics developed the 22S as a possible replacement for the NC6 SAW. In comparison to the SAW, it features a faster firing rate and reload time, but is limited by a 50-round detachable box magazine. NC use only.
Aptly named, the  T9 CARV's rate of fire allows it to cut through whole groups of enemies before needing to reload. TR use only.

This versatile variant of the CARV can adapt to nearly any situation thanks to a wide range of attachments. Compared to its predecessor, it features more controllable recoil in exchange for slightly slower rate of fire. TR use only.
The MSW-R was designed to meet the needs of mobile Terran Republic shock troopers. Its light weight and fast reload time allows forward soldiers to push forward without stopping. TR use only.
The versatile Solstice VE3 is an effective carbine suitable for most situations. VS use only.
The VX6-7's fast rate of fire and lightweight construction make it an excellent weapon in close quarters combat. VS use only.

Based off of the Pulsar assault rifle platform, the compact Pulsar C was developed to support more mobile operations. While not as easy to control, the heavy-hitting Pulsar C is far more devastating at close range. VS use only.
The AF-19 Mercenary became the standard issue carbine for the NC due to its low production costs. It features controllable recoil that makes it effective at close to medium ranges. NC use only.
Genudine Dynamics' initial venture into carbines produced the GD-7F. Its high rate of fire makes it an effective weapon in close quarter combat situations. NC use only.
The powerful AC-X11 was released shortly before Auraxis' global war yet still remains in common use due to its famed reliability and high stopping power. NC use only.
Originally designed for spec-ops missions that can contain any number of situations, the TRAC-5's adaptability make it a solid choice for any soldier. TR use only.
Very few weapons are able to touch the Lynx's incredible rate of fire. Featuring a cyclic rate of 909 RPM, the LC2 Lynx tears through infantry at close to medium range.
The T5 AMC's damage output and controllable recoil was designed around giving Terran Republic soldiers increased effectiveness in medium range encounters. TR use only.
The Pulsar VS1 is the standard issue assault rifle for the Vanu Sovereignty. Its low recoil design allows it to remain effective in most situations. VS use only.
The H-V45 was created with a focus on close quarters mobility. Its light weight does not slow the shooter as much as most other weapons in its class. VS use only.
The CME's high projectile velocity and good accuracy make it a very effective weapon at medium and long ranges. VS use only.

name.en: Primary: Assault Rifle: NC1 Gauss Rifle

description.en: The standard issue NC1 Gauss Rifle was the first successful implementation of coilgun technology in small arms. NC use only.
The sleek, compact design of the GR-22 improves handling when firing on the move, making it an excellent choice for close quarters combat. NC use only.
The powerful and accurate Reaper DMR was developed to fulfill the needs of soldiers who prefer to provide support from a distance. NC use only.
The standard assault rifle of the Terran Republic, the T1 Cycler features a 40-round magazine and a fast rate of fire, allowing it to remain effective in most situations. TR use only.

The Cycler TRV's fast rate of fire makes it extremely effective in close quarters, though that same rate of fire and high recoil limits its effectiveness at long range when firing in full-auto. TR use only.

The SABR-13's two-round burst walks the line between a long-range marksman rifle, and a mid-range assault rifle. For especially distant targets, this weapon can toggle a semi-auto firing mode for increased accuracy. TR use only.
The heavy Quasar VM1 was one of the earliest weapons created with discovered Vanu technology. The rapid firing plasma cannon can tear apart enemy foot soldiers with ease. VS use only.
The Comet VM2 is the standard-issue anti-vehicle MAX weaponry. The explosive plasma orbs it fires are capable of melting through heavy tank armor. VS use only.
The anti-air NS-10 Burster uses Smart Unguided Projectiles to explode in the presence of ferrous material at high speeds. All factions can use NS weapons.
Anti-Infantry: NS-60 Flamethrower
The arm-mounted NCM1 Scattercannon functions as an automatic shotgun capable of cutting through enemy squads. NC use only.
The NCM2 Falcon is the standard for the NC's anti-vehicle MAX weaponry. It features powerful warheads capable of heavily damaging enemy vehicles and MAXes alike. NC use only.
The anti-air NS-10 Burster uses Smart Unguided Projectiles to explode in the presence of ferrous material at high speeds. All factions can use NS weapons.
Anti-Infantry: NS-60 Flamethrower

name.en: Primary Right: Anti-Infantry: M1 Heavy Cycler

description.en: Originally developed as a stationary turret, the MAX-mounted, multi-barreled M1 Heavy Cycler is capable of shredding apart entire squads without needing to reload. TR use only.

name.en: Primary Left: Anti-Vehicle: M3 Pounder HEG

description.en: The M3 Pounder fires High Explosive Grenade rounds that have a devastating effect on enemy armor. TR use only.
The anti-air NS-10 Burster uses Smart Unguided Projectiles to explode in the presence of ferrous material at high speeds. All factions can use NS weapons.
Anti-Infantry: NS-60 Flamethrower

The sound of the menacing T7 MCG firing strikes fear into the heart of its enemies. It is capable of sustained fire that can tear apart entire squads. TR use only.

The experimental Lasher X2 fires volatile orbs of plasma that explode on contact with hard surfaces. Field trials have demonstrated its effectiveness at suppressing fire, flushing out enemies and melting infantry. VS use only.

The Saron Laser Cannon is the standard nose cannon for the Vanu Sovereignty's Scythe. Its balanced reload, magazine size, and rate of fire allow it to adapt to any situation. VS use only.
The M20 Mustang is the standard air superiority nose cannon for the NC Reaver.  Its high caliber rounds allow it to do more damage up close and at range.  NC use only.
The M18 Needler is the standard air superiority nose cannon for the TR Mosquito.  Its small caliber rounds allow it to sustain fire for longer and at a higher fire rate.  TR use only.
The CAS30 Tank Buster armor piercing rounds are highly effective against tanks. All factions can use this weapon.

The L-24R Spur is equipped with specialized optics that allow the pilot to adjust the weapons aim rather than being fixed forward.

Optics for this weapon are engaged with Weapon Optic function or Cockpit Mouse Freelook hotkeys.
The L105 Zephyr fires a salvo of 105mm high-explosive rounds which are effective against both armor and personnel. All factions can use this weapon.
The C150 Dalton fires 150mm Armor Piercing Anti-Tank rounds that inflict massive damage in a single shot. All factions can use this weapon.
The AP30 Shredder machine gun is capable of inflicting sustained and accurate damage with its 30mm armor piercing rounds.  All factions can use this weapon.
The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

The C75 is able to rapid fire six 75mm HEAT shells.  The damage potential is great when all shells hit their target, but the cannon is unstable when firing at the maximum rate. All factions can use this weapon.
The Python HEAT carries quick-reloading high-explosive anti-tank rounds that have balanced effectiveness against armor and infantry. All factions can use this weapon.

The semi-automatic Mauler S6's overclocked propulsion coils and tighter spread make it a versatile close-range weapon. NC use only.
The iconic NC12 Sweeper shotgun features a high capacity magazine as well as considerable stopping power at close range. It excels in urban combat scenarios. NC use only.
Striking a balance between stopping power and rounds per minute, the fully automatic AF-57 Piston is the preferred shotgun for close-quarters combat. NC use only.

Genudine Dynamics released the highly mobile Claw GD-66 shotgun early in the 29th century. Its lightweight action allows for a higher rate of fire than other pump-action shotguns on the market. NC use only.
Liberty Arsenal's flagship pump shotgun, the LA39 Bruiser is designed to inflict massive damage on infantry targets. NC use only.
Designed with a lightning-quick receiver, the fully-automatic AS16 Nighthawk features a higher rate of fire than typical shotguns. TR use only.
The powerful TS4 Haymaker features a large magazine, allowing for sustained fire without needing to reload. TR use only.
The gas-powered, semi-automatic FA1 Barrage's narrow shot pattern allows it to put down enemies at ranges beyond other shotguns. TR use only.
The TRS-12 Uppercut's highly mobile platform provides great versatility and speed while engaging multiple targets. TR use only.
The TAS-16 Blackjack boasts extremely high close quarters burst damage, even for a shotgun. TR use only.
Manufactured with an energy-efficient discharge coil, the high capacity Nova is capable of extended fire before needing to change power cores. VS use only.
The Thanatos VE70's lethality in close quarters makes it a frightening opponent in urban combat scenarios. VS use only.
The Pandora VX25 automatic plasma shotgun is capable of rapidly eliminating opponents in close quarters. VS use only.
Utilizing an energy efficient power core interface, the experimental Phobos VX86 is able to provide sustained fire before needing a new battery. VS use only.
The Deimos VA29 is one of Vanu Amerish's most popular shotguns. Its high damage energy shells mow through enemy soldiers at a frightening pace. VS use only.
The automatic AF-18 Stalker is deadly in close quarters and medium range combat. NC use only.
The AF-6 Shadow is a semi-automatic scout rifle purpose-built for closer effective ranges than sniper rifles. NC use only.
The accurate Warden semi-automatic battle rifle is effective at stopping infantry far past the typical LMG or carbine. NC use only.
The automatic SOAS-20's high rate of fire makes it an excellent choice for mid-range encounters. TR use only.
The accurate Heavy Scout Rifle features a higher rate of fire compared to semi-auto sniper rifles. TR use only.
The semi-automatic AMR-66 battle rifle uses powerful cartridges that hold considerable stopping power up to medium range. TR use only.
The fully automatic Artemis VX26 scout rifle is capable of quickly dispatching enemy infantry at close to medium ranges. VS use only.
Created for spec-ops missions where sniper rifles would prove unsuitable, the powerful semi-automatic Nyx VX31 scout rifle excels at medium range. VS use only.
The heavy-hitting Eidolon VE33 features accurate semi-automatic fire capable of dropping distant targets with ease. VS use only.

The Burster XS uses smaller projectiles than the NS-10, allowing for a greater capacity and rate of fire.
The AF-34 Mattock features increased effective range in comparison to the other MAX anti-infantry weapons. NC use only.
Known for its lethality in close quarters, the automatic AF-41 Hacksaw's high rate of fire gives it an advantage for point defense scenarios. NC use only.
Auraxis Firearms' first venture into MAX weaponry was the AF-23 Grinder. It features an extended ammo reserve for sustained fire. NC use only.
Placeholder

Developed to further push the MAX's anti-vehicle role on the field, the Eagle's deadly armor-piercing warhead focuses all of its explosive force into the target, rather than around the point of impact.
The Burster XS uses smaller projectiles than the NS-10, allowing for a greater capacity and rate of fire.
Ironically nicknamed "Mercy," the latest iteration of the accurate Mobile Rotary Cannon can drop enemy infantry at a distance. TR use only.
The M6 Onslaught was designed as a defensive alternative to the MX1, allowing for a higher rate of fire suitable for holding down important locations. TR use only.
The M2's increased ammo capacity has proven itself as a boon to small or stranded squads. TR use only.
Placeholder
The M8's Saboted Kinetic Energy Penetrator rounds lack the explosive component of the MX3, but are more effective at penetrating thick armor.
The Burster XS uses smaller projectiles than the NS-10, allowing for a greater capacity and rate of fire.
The lightweight Blueshift VM5 anti-infantry MAX weapon was designed to provide increased accuracy over the standard-issue VM1. VS use only.
The Nebula VM20's overclocked power core interface allows for a rapid rate of fire to quickly dispatch enemy infantry in close quarters. VS use only.

A late successor to the Quasar VM1, the Cosmos uses experimental plasma containment technology, resulting in larger rounds. These large plasma rounds cause less cranial trauma, but are significantly easier to strike mobile targets with. VS use only.
Placeholder
Constructed to counter the heaviest armor, the Meteor VM4's focused plasma orb lacks the explosive component of its predecessor, but is able to damage vehicles and MAXes to greater effect.

Designed in the late 28th century for close quarters and mid-range combat scenarios, the Carnage AR features high hip fire accuracy and an adaptable attachment system. NC use only.

name.en: Primary: Assault Rifle: Gauss Rifle S

description.en: Many TR soldiers praise the Terran Assault Rifle's performance in the field, crediting many victories to its incredible hip fire accuracy and high rate of fire. TR use only.

The Terran Operations Rifle is a favorite amongst TR who feel at home with an all-around performer. Deadly accurate with fast reload assists for its 40 round magazine, the TORQ-9's versatility and ease of use make it a solid choice in combat.

name.en: Primary: Assault Rifle: T1S Cycler SB

description.en: The T1S features a shorter barrel than the standard Cycler, giving it better performance in close-quarters combat.
The Terran Offensive Rifle Extended was designed to provide easily controllable recoil without sacrificing stopping power.
The RMR-4 is a magnum-caliber marksman rifle that excels at stopping targets from afar.
Accurate and easily controllable, the DMR-99's low-recoil design allows it to reliably hit targets even at long distances.
The Corvus VA55 features low recoil and high accuracy over sustained fire, making it a popular choice for long range engagements. VS use only.

Genudine Dynamics unveiled the Razor GD-23 in the early 29th century. The Razor quickly became popular due to its high accuracy and controllable recoil, allowing it to outperform other carbines at long distances. NC use only.
Boasting a longer barrel than its compact Light Carbine cousin, the mobile LC3 Jaguar was designed to provide accurate hip fire at longer distances than the Lynx. TR use only.
The Serpent VE92's overclocked power core interface allows for an extremely high rate of fire, making it a lethal opponent in close quarters combat. VS use only.

The LA1 Anchor is tuned for close quarters effectiveness. It features best-in-class rate of fire for its considerable stopping power, and a 50 round box magazine for quick combat reloads. NC use only.
Developed for a mix of close quarters combat and point defense, the T32 Bull features both balanced recoil and high maneuverability. TR use only.
The Ursa features manageable recoil and a high velocity projectile, making it extremely effective at ranges beyond that of other LMGs. VS use only.
The semi-automatic Impetus sniper rifle is a favorite amongst Infiltrators for covert operations. It excels at medium range due to its considerable stopping power and rate of fire. NC use only.
The high muzzle velocity of the LA80's projectiles reduces the amount that a target must be lead, making it an excellent choice for sniping targets at extreme distances. NC use only.
The bulky EM4 Longshot's overclocked propulsion coils allow for projectiles that both travel faster and hit harder in comparison to other bolt-action sniper rifles. NC use only.

name.en: Primary: Sniper Rifle: NC10 Bolt Precision Pro

description.en: The Hitman's high muzzle velocity gives it a significant advantage when leading distant targets.
The KSR-35's high-powered 7x65 cartridge is extremely effective at dropping targets at medium range. TR use only.
The powerful bolt-action SR-7 is capable of eliminating targets from extremely long distances. TR use only.
Chambered for the powerful 12.7x75mm round, the high muzzle velocity and stopping power afforded by the RAMS .50M ensures shots will hit harder and faster than others in its class. TR use only.
The TRAP-M1 can switch between short-range 3-round burst and long-range 2-round burst firing modes, allowing for incredible flexibility on the battlefield.
Recoil dampeners throughout the hefty Phantom VA23 make pulling off medium-range follow up shots effortless. VS use only.

The high velocity plasma projectiles the Vanu Sovereignty's V10 fires reduces the amount that moving targets must be lead, making it one of the easiest to use long range weapons on Auraxis. VS use only.
The powerful Parallax VX3 sniper rifle's heavy-hitting, high velocity plasma projectiles allow for easy long distance shots. VS use only.
The Lightyear VX2's overcharged plasma generator is capable of eliminating distant targets rapidly.
